pm.label: Product Manager
pm.description: Product Managers who combine strategic thinking with AI fluency to build next-generation products

ai_native.variant_description: You're leveraging AI at a strategic level for product decisions, automation, and insights
ai_native.mba_fit: Ideal candidate for AI-focused programs. You can bridge business strategy and AI implementation.

ai_strategic.variant_description: You understand AI's potential and are beginning to use it for competitive advantage
ai_strategic.mba_fit: Strong candidate. Focus on deepening AI strategy skills for maximum impact.

developing.variant_description: You're building product fundamentals. Adding AI fluency will accelerate your career
developing.mba_fit: Ready with focused upskilling. Prioritize AI literacy and strategic thinking.

pm.ideal_profile: PMs with 3-5+ years experience, strong business acumen, and AI fluency are ideal candidates

finance.label: Finance Professional

ai_native.variant_description: You're using AI for scenario modeling, anomaly detection, and predictive finance

ai_strategic.variant_description: You're integrating AI tools into financial analysis and reporting
ai_strategic.mba_fit: Strong potential. Deepen AI strategy to become indispensable to leadership.

developing.variant_description: You have strong finance fundamentals. AI literacy will differentiate you
developing.mba_fit: Ready with AI upskilling. Focus on strategic finance and AI tools.

finance.ideal_profile: Finance professionals with 3-5+ years experience and emerging AI capabilities
